description: Returns information about a specific block storage disk snapshot.

parameters.name: diskSnapshotName
parameters.description: The name of the disk snapshot ( my-disk-snapshot).

nested_items.name: diskSnapshot
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the disk snapshot.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the disk snapshot ( my-disk-snapshot).

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the disk snapshot.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about an instance or another resource in Lightsail. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the disk snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: sizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in GB.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The status of the disk snapshot operation.

nested_items.name: fromDiskName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the source disk from which the disk snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: fromDiskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source disk from which the disk snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: fromInstanceName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the source instance from which the disk (system volume) snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: fromInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source instance from which the disk (system volume) snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: isFromAutoSnapshot
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the snapshot was created from an automatic snapshot.
